name: Ultimate Burger
description:
The Game

"Ultimate Burger" is a RTS where we will have to manage our troops and economy to defeat the evil rats who are polluting the environment. This was made as my Final Degree Project at EVAD (Escuela Superior de Videojuegos y Arte Digital)

Controls

To interact with everything you will use your mouse, there are also keyboard shortcuts for faster interaction.

Features

Very easy and accessible gameplay, units will attack on their own depending on whether they are in attack on sight or defense mode, also features nice and cute visuals and soundtrack .

How to play

Your main objective is to defeat the rats before they defeat you, to achieve this, you will need a good supply of troops to attack and defend.
